Join our community and start creating the future you want today wherever you find yourself!

item.title: Dreadlocks Saga: Achimota SHS Faces Another Lawsuit!
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Oheneba Kwaku Nkrabea, one of the two dreadlocks students involved in the Achimota School admission saga has also sued the school over his rejection, following that of Tyrone Iras Marhguy. His plight to the court was to force Achimota School to admit him into the school for the purposes of his education. However, he is...

The post Dreadlocks Saga: Achimota SHS Faces Another Lawsuit! appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: More Than 60 Dead Big Fishes Washed Ashore In 2 Days In Ghana; Osu, Axim And Keta…
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
A lot of fish from the sea were found dead and washed ashore in Axim, Keta, and Osu, in Ghana but with an unknown cause, however, believed to be a result of a chemical spill. This alone as noted, can pose a threat to the health of the general public, if care is not taken....

The post More Than 60 Dead Big Fishes Washed Ashore In 2 Days In Ghana; Osu, Axim And Keta… appeared first on The New Vibes.
